EmailTemplate.subject: Lessons Learned Operating A Cloud Environment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
What recent factors have contributed to cloud environments becoming more complex? How do these contributions impact IT operations? And, how should you adapt to be more effective?
VMTurbo is hosting an expert discussion regarding “Overcoming Key Challenges in Operating Cloud Environments” with contributions from Roy Illsley, principal analyst at Ovum, and Kevin Van Mondfrans, vice president at cloud service provider Layered Tech. Join us for an informative webinar and learn:
- Key operational challenges you may face as you develop and expand your virtualized and cloud environments - Best practices for dealing with today’s cloud operations realities - Innovative approaches to unlocking the full value of virtualized infrastructure and cloud services
Reserve a spot. Register today! <https://www3.gotomeeting.com/register/393344606>
EVENT: Webinar: Overcoming Key Challenges in Operating Cloud Environments DATE: Tuesday, January 22, 2103 TIME: 12 pm ET
